job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Job Description: a)	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or Electrical Engineering (with a Software emphasis) b)	5-8 years’ experience specifically in the Flight Simulation industry c)	Recent experience with Linux OS d)	Recent experience programming in C or C++ e)	Experience with systems engineering processes, to include requirements analysis, system architecture definition and design, and system verification testing   *Note: No C2C & No Sponsorship available for this role.
